author: Roxanna ☕👯🎡🎪👻👹💀🔪🎈
text:
~
Wandering past a crooked tree, its' limbs
  reaching for its' roots-
Wandering past the burnt out house, with
  broken dolls hung by their legs
  from the porch railing-
Quarantine has left me alone&lost in these
  strange wanderings..
~
#amwriting #vss365 #quarantine

author: Roxanna ☕👯🎡🎪👻👹💀🔪🎈
text:
~
In strolls the jester, all bells & 
 sparkles & loud song
(with a strange&bloody smile)

He begins to regale the crowd..
 to captivate..with tricks & stunts;
At last, with a chilling stare &
 not a care, he bares 
his skeleton to the world
(& all with a bloody smile)..
~

author: Roxanna ☕👯🎡🎪👻👹💀🔪🎈
text:
~

They fear us.
Creative power
Is
Destructive power

We can break
their tiny (un-magic) wands
by a wombs' command;
We can birth & destroy worlds-

That's the real magic..
     & their greatest fear...

~
#amwriting #MyBody

author: Roxanna ☕👯🎡🎪👻👹💀🔪🎈
text:
~

with heinous mind games
they pushed her deeper inside
traps of ignorance...

~

#amwriting #haikuhorrorprompt 283

author: Roxanna ☕👯🎡🎪👻👹💀🔪🎈
text:
~
I watched as a glimmering sheen formed 
across his skull where I peeled the skin slowly-

Like ice forming a glaze in the freezing night..

I drug the blade down his neck, opening his
pumping jugular as he convulsed-

& he thought I was through with him..
~

#horrorprompt 715 https://t.co/weXIOOgnOl

author: Roxanna ☕👯🎡🎪👻👹💀🔪🎈
text:
~

Notes that wander for the senses pleasure
Unfinished & rough as finifugal fantasies of lust
My eyes burn like the polluted skies above
I crave that part of you I taste in 3 a.m. dreams
Music is lost before dawn on slow lifting fog..

~
#amwriting #MacabreWords #finifugal https://t.co/OgDwSEHrYi
